item.title: Color Me Badd - I Wanna Sex You Up

item.title: Color Me Badd - Wild Flower
item.description:
Shes faced
the hardest times
You could
imagine
And many times
her eyes
Fought back
the tears
And when her
youthful world
Was about
to fall in
Each time
her slender shoulders
Bore the weight
of all her fears
And the sorrow
no one hears
Still rings
in midnight silence
In her
ears
Let her cryz
for shes a lady
Let her dream
for shes a child
Let the rain
fall down upon her
Shes a free and
gentle flower
Growing
wild
And if by chance
that I should hold her
Let me hold her
for a time
And if allowed
but one possession
I will pick her
from the garden
To be mine
mine

Be careful
how you touch her
For shell
awaken
And sleeps
the only freedom
That
she knows
And when you walk
into her eyes
You wont
believe
The way
shes always payin
For a debt
she never owes
And the silent wind
still blows
That only
she can hear
And so
she goes
Let her cry
for shes a lady
Let her dream
for shes a child
Let the rain
fall down upon her
Shes a free and
gentle flower
Growing
wild
Let her cry
for shes a lady
Let her dream
for shes a child
Let the rain
fall
Let the rain
fall
Shes a free and
gentle flower
Growing
wild
Shes a free and
gentle flower
Shes a flower
growing wild
